prompt:
Your task is to generate an activity aligned with global standards for project-based learning and learning-by-doing pedagogy. The activity is targeted towards undergraduate students at a liberal STEM university. Required Details: topic or concept, learning outcome, difficulty level (beginner/moderate/advanced), modality (physical/online/programming/group discussion/laboratory), duration, graded activity or not.
Infer the Required Details from the selected files ({{file_names}}) and confirm in one shot before generating, or prompt the user to provide clarity as required. Then, design a tailored educational activity aligned with the provided details.
Output Format:
Present the finalized activity as a list with the following sections in order: type, modality and duration of activity, title, topics and concepts, required materials (physical or digital - keep to a minimum), concise and actionable instructions to run the activity in class. If the activity is graded, generate a rubric to evaluate the activity. The rubric should have criteria and descriptors for different levels - each level should be associated with marks.
